member.summary: ConfigScriptorForm

member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.#ctor
member.summary: Initialise ConfigScriptor form and search for text files to display in combo box on startup

member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.SearchAddTextFiles
member.summary: search directory for text files read into combo box cmbxCmdScriptList include .txt extension
member.returns: returns, in a combo box, a list of all .txt files in debug\ConfigTemplateFiles folder, directory/file not found exception

member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.CmbxCmdScriptList_SelectedIndexChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: read selected script into command display

member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.ShowConfigScript(System.String)
member.summary: display command file names in check list box, clear previous selection called by cmbxCmdScriptList_SelectedIndexChanged switch based method
member.param: created in "cmbxCmdScriptList_SelectedIndexChanged" method from user click event and passed in to search for
member.returns: read all lines to a list box from a text file passed in if found, file not exist message if not found.

member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.LbxConfigScript_DoubleClick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: copies commands to the editor with newline

member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.SaveToTextFile
member.summary: save editor contents to a text file in location of users choice.
member.returns: exception error, if correct then file saved message

member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.LoadTextFile
member.summary: load file contents of .txt to the editor to append, adjust, or view
member.returns: exception error or file loaded successfully message

member.name: M:NWConfigScriptor.ConfigScriptorForm.AddTextFile
member.summary: Add a command text file created by a user to the configtext folder in the application for continued use. Becomes available to select from command script list.

member.summary: Open file browser and remove file from the application ConfigTemplateFiles folder

member.summary: save editor contents to a user named file and location for future reference.
member.returns: saved to user selected location and file name, file not saved if user cancels, directory access denied exception, file compilation error
